name: White Flag Ministry
description: Cold weather relief ministry providing shelter, hot meals, clothing, blankets, and counseling services to homeless individuals in Corbin, KY. Operates seasonally from Monday after Thanksgiving through mid-March. Located at the Burkhart Center at St. John's Episcopal Church. Provides case management through RRJ Solutions for mental health and substance abuse counseling. Partners with local businesses, churches, and community members to serve the homeless population.
source: Verified from official website and multiple online sources
hours: Monday-Friday 4:00 PM-5:00 PM (Seasonal: Monday after Thanksgiving through mid-March)
eligibility: Homeless individuals in need of cold weather relief
notes: A mission of First Baptist Church fueled by the community of Corbin, KY. Shelter nights are announced on their Facebook page. Operates solely on private donations. Partners with RRJ Solutions for counseling services and St. John's Episcopal Church for facility use.
